content:
NOTE: We only show up to 72 since there're only 72 lines in this file.
Here's the result of running `cat -n` on /workspace/problem_statement.txt:
     1	Folder Path /matplotlib
     2	
     3	[Bug]: get_backend() clears figures from Gcf.figs if they were created under rc_context
     4	### Bug summary
     5	
     6	calling `matplotlib.get_backend()` removes all figures from `Gcf` if the *first* figure in `Gcf.figs` was created in an `rc_context`.
     7	
     8	### Code for reproduction
     9	
    10	```python
    11	import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
    12	from matplotlib import get_backend, rc_context
    13	
    14	# fig1 = plt.figure() # <- UNCOMMENT THIS LINE AND IT WILL WORK
    15	# plt.ion() # <- ALTERNATIVELY, UNCOMMENT THIS LINE AND IT WILL ALSO WORK
    16	with rc_context():
    17	fig2 = plt.figure()
    18	before = f'{id(plt._pylab_helpers.Gcf)} {plt._pylab_helpers.Gcf.figs!r}'
    19	get_backend()
    20	after = f'{id(plt._pylab_helpers.Gcf)} {plt._pylab_helpers.Gcf.figs!r}'
    21	
    22	assert before == after, '\n' + before + '\n' + after
    23	```
    24	
    25	
    26	### Actual outcome
    27	
    28	```
    29	---------------------------------------------------------------------------
    30	AssertionError Traceback (most recent call last)
    31	<ipython-input-1-fa4d099aa289> in <cell line: 11>()
    32	9 after = f'{id(plt._pylab_helpers.Gcf)} {plt._pylab_helpers.Gcf.figs!r}'
    33	10
    34	---> 11 assert before == after, '\n' + before + '\n' + after
    35	12
    36	
    37	AssertionError:
    38	94453354309744 OrderedDict([(1, <matplotlib.backends.backend_qt.FigureManagerQT object at 0x7fb33e26c220>)])
    39	94453354309744 OrderedDict()
    40	```
    41	
    42	### Expected outcome
    43	
    44	The figure should not be missing from `Gcf`. Consequences of this are, e.g, `plt.close(fig2)` doesn't work because `Gcf.destroy_fig()` can't find it.
    45	
    46	### Additional information
    47	
    48	_No response_
    49	
    50	### Operating system
    51	
    52	Xubuntu
    53	
    54	### Matplotlib Version
    55	
    56	3.5.2
    57	
    58	### Matplotlib Backend
    59	
    60	QtAgg
    61	
    62	### Python version
    63	
    64	Python 3.10.4
    65	
    66	### Jupyter version
    67	
    68	n/a
    69	
    70	### Installation
    71	
    72	conda
